conflict_topics.description: Disagreement on who does what and when
conflict_topics.resolution_strategy: Create weekly rotation chart together. Review every Sunday evening to adjust as needed.
conflict_topics.progress_notes: Chart implemented 2 weeks ago. Seeing improvement, fewer arguments. Need to stick with it and make adjustments.

conflict_topics.description: Different comfort levels with spending vs saving
conflict_topics.resolution_strategy: Monthly budget meeting on first Sunday. Agree on 'fun money' allowance for each person - no questions asked spending.
conflict_topics.progress_notes: Need to schedule first official meeting. Draft budget created.

conflict_topics.resolution_strategy: TBD - still discussing potential approaches. Considering scheduled date nights AND solo hobby time blocks.
conflict_topics.progress_notes: Ongoing conversation. Both feel heard. Working on compromise.

entries.title: Morning reflection
entries.content: Today I felt centered after meditation. Grateful for quiet time before the day begins. Focused on Psalm 46:10 - 'Be still and know that I am God.' Helped me approach the day with peace.

entries.title: Workout notes
entries.content: Great yoga session this morning. Feeling stronger and more flexible than last week. Held tree pose for a full minute! Small victories add up.

entries.title: Mom's call
entries.content: Had a wonderful hour-long conversation with Mom. She's excited about Thanksgiving plans and wants to try a new stuffing recipe. Reminded me how much these regular calls mean to her (and me!).

entries.title: Woodworking plans
entries.content: Spent time sketching out bookshelf design. Decided on 5 shelves with adjustable heights. Excited to start building next weekend. YouTube tutorials have been super helpful.
